feed.title: Wiki-Go Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.5.0
entry.content:
• Adds renaming to attachments dialog with translation by ChatGPT #16 (8d3e9e0 by Amin Persia)
  • Bugfix: fixes direction blocks not being processed correctly (753c604 by Amin Persia)
  • Bugfix: fixes column move left breaking table if it's the first column (7bbbef6 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds more keyboard shortcuts #50 (e91b1d0 by Amin Persia)
  • Initial release of markdown table editor using mte-kernel 2.1.1 #43 (b8d6100 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds translations for settings.hide_attachments using ChatGPT (c346480 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds settings.hide_attachments option #41 (b6058f5 by Amin Persia)
  • Re-orders the new document dialog (86809bf by Amin Persia)
  • Adds Document Sorting and Naming to README #47 (0ee3546 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds translation for "Enable link embedding from clipboard" using ChatGPT #12 (de36e6f by Amin Persia)
  • Adds "Enable link embedding from clipboard" setting #12 (2c9b4e0 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds Document Sorting and Naming to README #45 (71612ed by Amin Persia)
  • Adds demo site files (6d7d369 by Amin Persia)
  • Updates README.md (d4547bf by Amin Persia)
  • Adds logo offset if it exists (dee58c5 by Amin Persia)
  • Bugfix: fixes SuperscriptPreprocessor malforming footnote parsing #44 (5868d96 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds issue templates (b1592a5 by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.5.1
entry.content:
• CSS changes to make three renderers look consistent - Page renderer - Editor preview - Version preview (8318912 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds the missing toc shortcode button to editor toolbar (f06fff8 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds word wrap toggle button with Alt+Z shortcut (a3709cc by Amin Persia)
  • Adds full width content option with translation by ChatGPT (65c9228 by Amin Persia)
  • Minor css cleanup (1b2bcca by Amin Persia)
  • Adds two types of sitemap #46 (f6246c0 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds api/files/rename endpoint example (404c169 by Amin Persia)
  • Fixes stored XSS attacks by reverting previous patch and sanitizing script tags #52 (461d8bd by Amin Persia)
  • Fixes stored XSS attacks by disabling unsafe HTML in Goldmark #52 (62e6bf1 by Amin Persia)
  • Fixes stats shortcodes evaluating when inside inline code blocks #53 (0ead998 by Amin Persia)
  • Merge pull request #48 from chrismalek/master (2f3f703 by Amin Persia)
  • Fixed some example stats markdown content - recenter to recent (fcf082e by Chris Malek)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.5.2
entry.content:
• Fixes rendering attachments with spaces in the filename #54 (0e35368 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds ctrl+shift+p to toggle preview and minor cleanups (aa47cd9 by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.5.3
entry.content:
• Moves auto disable debug mode after checkout #60 (491e72e by Amin Persia)
  • Adds auto disable debug mode when releasing #60 (d19dfa9 by Amin Persia)
  • Fixes unsaved changes issue with translation done by ChatGPT #59 (41c6e21 by Amin Persia)
  • minor cleanup (9db08c7 by Amin Persia)
  • Fixes undoing when there's no history erases content #58 (4371f83 by Amin Persia)
  • Typography improvement and wiki-go binary cleanup #57 for 1/2, 1/4, and 3/4 they must be in () for it to be processed. (957590f by Amin Persia)

entry.title: New release for Wiki-Go: Release v1.5.4
entry.content:
• Adds ctrl+shift+f hotkey to focus the search box #62 (ad4c8d4 by Amin Persia)
  • Fixes search results layout when full width is enabled #61 (7ffbb00 by Amin Persia)
  • Adds timestamp to "dev" version string so static files are not cached when testing This will be overriden when building a release with the version number (c7f094a by Amin Persia)
  • Cleans up translations. Adds improved translations by ChatGTP-4.1. (cf779ad by Amin Persia)
  • Creates a new unsaved changes dialog to improve user experience #59 (3b980da by Amin Persia)
